vectorData.altText: 16. Dorsal horn cells receive input from the body and limbs regarding two somatosensory modalities, __________________ and _________________.
That is incorrect. Click here      to learn the answer, then come back to try again.
That’s right!  Dorsal horn cells (secondary neuron) receive input from the body and limbs regarding two somatosensory modalities: nociception & temperature.

1° neurons:
cell bodies in DRG in the PNS
axons project to CNS via dorsal roots, synapse onto:

2° neurons: 
cell bodies in the dorsal horn of the spinal cord; axons decussate
ascend in the spinothalamic tract (STT) of the ventrolateral column
becomes the spinal lemniscus (SL) in brainstem, synapse onto:

3°neurons:
cell bodies in the VP thalamus & project to:
 1° somatosensory cortex in the postcentral gyrus
Nociception & Temperature Sense from the Body
